goatText: Tech-Shop is my full-stack pet project created to improve my frontend development skills. Through it, I became acquainted with backend development and successfully deepened my knowledge in this area. This project involved completing a lot of tasks, including: integrating the backend with the frontend, localization, setting up and using a database, deploying both the frontend and backend parts, configuring authentication, implementing a shopping cart, adding the ability to create new products, categories, and subcategories of various levels, and enabling interaction with products both as an administrator and as a user, among other things.
